Package kueres.base

Class BaseService<E extends BaseEntity<E>,​R extends BaseRepository<E>>

java.lang.Object
kueres.eventbus.EventSubscriber
kueres.base.BaseService<E,​R>
Direct Known Subclasses:
EventService
public abstract class BaseService<E extends BaseEntity<E>,​R extends BaseRepository<E>>
extends EventSubscriber
The BaseService provides the services needed by a BaseController. To operate correctly a BaseEntity and its BaseRepository are needed.
Since:
Feb 22, 2021
Version:
1.0
Author:
Tim Engbrocks, tim.engbrocks@student.kit.edu

  • Method Details

    • findAll

      public org.springframework.data.domain.Page<E> findAll​(EntitySpecification<E> specification, org.springframework.data.domain.Pageable pageable)
      Find all entities of the services' BaseEntity-type. The result can filtered, sorted and paged.
      Parameters:
      specification - - filter for the result.
      pageable - - sort and pagination for the result.
      Returns:
      The result as a page.

    • findById

      public E findById​(long id)
      Find an entity of the services' BaseEntity-type by its identifier.
      Parameters:
      id - - the entity's identifier.
      Returns:
      The entity with the given identifier.
      Throws:
      org.springframework.data.rest.webmvc.ResourceNotFoundException - if there is no entity with the specified identifier.

    • create

      public E create​(E entity)
      Create an entity of the services' BaseEntity-type.
      Parameters:
      entity - - the entity that should be created. This entity can not have an identifier.
      Returns:
      The created entity. This contains the entity's identifier.

    • update

      public E update​(long id, java.lang.String detailsJSON) throws com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.JsonMappingException, java.lang.InstantiationException, java.lang.IllegalAccessException, java.lang.IllegalArgumentException, java.lang.reflect.InvocationTargetException, java.lang.NoSuchMethodException, java.lang.SecurityException, com.fasterxml.jackson.core.JsonProcessingException
      Update an entity of the services' BaseEntity-type by its identifier. Fields that are not populated in the updated data will not be changed.
      Parameters:
      id - - the identifier of the entity that should be updated.
      detailsJSON - - the updated data in JSON format.
      Returns:
      The updated entity.
      Throws:
      com.fasterxml.jackson.core.JsonProcessingException - if the JSON string can not be processed
      java.lang.SecurityException - if the JSON string can not be processed
      java.lang.NoSuchMethodException - if the JSON string can not be processed
      java.lang.reflect.InvocationTargetException - if the JSON string can not be processed
      java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the JSON string can not be processed
      java.lang.IllegalAccessException - if the JSON string can not be processed
      java.lang.InstantiationException - if the JSON string can not be processed
      com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.JsonMappingException - if the JSON string can not be processed
      org.springframework.data.rest.webmvc.ResourceNotFoundException - if there is no entity with the specified identifier.

    • delete

      public E delete​(long id)
      Delete an entity of the services' BaseEntity-type by its identifier.
      Parameters:
      id - - the identifier of the entity that should be deleted.
      Returns:
      The entity that was deleted.
      Throws:
      org.springframework.data.rest.webmvc.ResourceNotFoundException - if there is no entity with the specified identifier.

      public java.lang.Class<E> getEntityClass()
